titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4222) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend for 6 months the application period under the legalization program.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-571.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/18/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4222 (alien legalization program).
